definition: a figurative restraint, fasten with a rope
details:
noun
- a figurative restraint
= synonyms: collar
- restraint consisting of a rope (or light chain) used to restrain an animal
= synonyms: lead, tether
- the cardinal number that is the sum of one and one and one
= synonyms: three, ternary, trey, troika, triad, trio, threesome, trinity, triplet, tierce, trine, ternion, tercet, terzetto, deuce-ace
verb
- fasten with a rope
= synonyms: rope
